ComicInfo.Title: A Tale of Two Clones
ComicInfo.Summary:
In a post-apocalyptic world gone medieval, the Church sends their top monk warrior to infiltrate a renegade scientist’s enclave and kidnap the J-Clone, the Lord’s vat-born twin. Saving the holy clone from the cross forces, the monk must confront the truth of his own (very immaculate) birth.
Clones of Marilyn Monroe, Hitler, Gandhi and Jesus… oh my! Misbegotten is cyber-punk religion gone mad!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Justin Case | 1 | B | Cover B | Justin Case | 2 | C | Cover C | Photo | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-28 21:10:47. [CVDB622693]
ComicInfo.Writer: Caesar Voghan, Eric Granger, Justin Case
ComicInfo.Characters: Adolf Hitler, Elano, Father Micon, Jesus Christ, Mahatma Gandhi, Marilyn Monroe, Sir Gottfrey
ComicInfo.Locations: Arizona, Atlantic Ocean, New Vatican City, The Harlequin Island
